column1: LEFT SIDE IS HOME TEAM FOR POOL PLAY GAMES

column1: NO OUTSIDE FOOD & DRINKS / SUPPORT THE HOST LEAGUE'S SNACK BAR
ANY TEAM WHO FORFEITS A GAME WILL BE ELIMINATED
CHINO HILLS COMMUNITY PARK - 3280 EUCALYPTUS AVE
